content:
Sure, here are some options for a quick and affordable bite to eat in Barnstaple:

1. The Snack Shack - This mobile food truck in the town square serves a variety of burgers, wraps, and sandwiches at a reasonable price.

2. Boston Tea Party - This café chain serves a range of breakfast items, sandwiches, and salads made with locally sourced ingredients at affordable prices.

3. Subway - This international sandwich chain has a branch in Barnstaple and offers a range of affordable sandwiches and salads.

4. Cafe Nero - This coffee shop chain serves a range of sandwiches, pastries, and snacks, as well as coffee and tea at reasonable prices.

5. Greggs - This bakery chain offers a range of affordable baked goods, sandwiches, and pasties.

6. Ola Cafe - This independent cafe serves breakfast, lunch, and coffee at affordable prices, with a focus on locally sourced ingredients.

These are just a few examples of affordable dining options in Barnstaple. Be sure to explore the town and ask locals for their suggestions as well.
